#!/bin/bash
yum update -y
yum install -y httpd
systemctl start httpd
systemctl enable httpd
echo "Hello World from $(hostname -f)" > /var/www/html/index.html
# Install CloudWatch Logs agent
yum install -y awslogs
systemctl start awslogsd
systemctl enable awslogsd
